a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Countries in which a woman is government's chief executive,
Chief executive is head of government or head of state, whoever has more power. This is recorded on December 31 of each year.
Data source: OWID based on V-Dem (v13)
Note: This is recorded on December 31 of each year.
